Choose a Premium plan and listen to music without ads and without limits on phones, speakers, and other devices. Pay in various ways. Cancel anytime.

All Premium plans include the following:

  • Listen to your favorite music without ads
  • Download songs to enjoy them offline
  • Listen to songs in any order
  • High audio quality
  • Listen to whatever you want with your friends, in real time
  • Organize your playlist queue

You have any questions?

We have the answers.

here you can resolve even more doubts

How does the CocoLoco Premium trial work?

If you've never used Premium before, you may be eligible for a free trial (or at a reduced price).

Even though it's a trial, you'll need to provide valid payment information to sign up. We'll use this information to confirm your country or region and charge you if you choose to keep Premium after the offer ends.

We'll send you a reminder 7 days before the trial ends. Terms and restrictions vary by country.

How do I cancel my Premium plan?

You can easily cancel your Premium plan whenever you want online on your account page. You'll remain Premium until the next billing date, after which your account will switch to the free plan.

You won't lose your playlists or saved music, which you can listen to with ads on the free account.

How does the Premium Duo plan work?

Premium Duo is a plan for couples living together. It's cheaper than having two Individual Premium accounts. We'll ask for the address to confirm that both members live there. You can invite one person to the plan immediately after purchase. Each member will have an independent Premium account, so you can listen to content simultaneously. Each will have their own playlists and saved music. The other member of the account won't be able to see what you're listening to.

Learn more about Premium Duo.

How does the Premium Family plan work?

Premium Family is a plan for up to 6 family members living in the same household. It's cheaper than having an Individual Premium account for each person. We'll ask for the address to confirm that all members live there. You can invite people to the plan immediately after purchase. Each member will have an independent Premium account, so you can listen to content simultaneously. Each will have their own playlists and saved music. The other members of the account won't be able to see what you're listening to.

Learn more about Premium Family.

How much does CocoLoco Premium cost?

The prices of CocoLoco Premium vary depending on the Premium plan you choose: the CocoLoco Premium Individual plan costs $6.49 per month; Premium Duo, $7.99 per month; and Premium Family, $9.99 per month. If you've never used a Premium plan before, you may be eligible for a free trial (or at a reduced price). Terms and restrictions apply by country.
